DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Yiqi Suoquan Tang , Chinese Herbal decoction , effective treatment female stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: A Chinese Herbal Decoction Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: The pilot randomize , control trial aim preliminarily assess effectiveness Yiqi Suoquan Tang , Chinese Herbal decoction , treatment female stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) . Eligible participant randomly allocate receive Yiqi Suoquan Tang pelvic floor muscle training ( PFMT ) use random number generator 1:1 ratio . To minimize evaluation bias , outcome assessor statistician mask treatment allocation . Assuming two-sided alpha 0.05 , power 90 % , 20 % drop-out , sample size 36 would need group . The statistical analysis perform base intention-to-treat principle , define patient receive least one treatment . Missing data replace last observed value . Continuous variable compare Student test Mann-Whitney U test ; categorical variable analyze chi-square test , Fisher 's exact test Kruskal-Wallis H test appropriate . For comparison two time point , pair t-test Wilcoxon sign rank test use appropriate . A statistically significant difference set P < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis stress urinary incontinence Must able swallow Chinese hebal decoction Urinary tract infection Neurogenic bladder Pelvic organ prolapse > stage 2 Overactive bladder Previous antiincontinence surgery Postvoid residual urine volume ( PVR ) > 100ml .
